title: Reminiscences of Yarrow. Edited and annotated by ... Professor Veitch, LL.D. Illustrated by Tom Scott ... Second edition
author: Russell, James
snippet: On the top of a ridge overlooking the farmhouseof Catslackburn stood the old tower of Catslack.

title: Reminiscences of Yarrow. Edited and annotated by ... Professor Veitch, LL.D. Illustrated by Tom Scott ... Second edition
author: Russell, James
snippet: The farm of Catslackburn was parcelled out intosome fourteen feus, on which such artisans as a smith,joiner, mason, tailor, shoemaker, and weaver mightbe located, to aid the farmers in their improvements,and meet the wants of the people.
